attributes.action: Remove Mark Drakeford as first Minister of Wales
attributes.additional_details:
The country should be a whole.
Mark Drakeford is taking things beyond a joke and taking our human rights away. We should be able to buy non essential goods in super markets especially if we can buy cigarettes and booze.
attributes.background: Remove Mark Drakeford as first Minister of Wales

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions calling for people to be sacked. In any case, this is a matter for the Welsh Assembly and not the UK Government or Parliament.
